scripts.sass: node-sass-chokidar style/ -o public --output-style compressed --source-map true --include-path node_modules/ -w
scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir build && node-sass-chokidar style/ -o build --output-style compressed --include-path node_modules/ && cp -r public/* build && ./node_modules/.bin/elm make src/Main.elm --optimize --output=build/app.js && uglifyjs build/app.js -c -m -o build/app.js
scripts.publish: git subtree push --prefix build origin gh-pages
